data.name: PARANOIA PLACE
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1218940/ETERNAL_BLOOD/


About the Game

SUMMARY

PARANOIA PLACE is a 2 player online co-op survival horror game. Together or alone, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty ghost! Each game will be different. Every collectable item will be hidden somewhere else. As the game progresses the unpredictable ghost will get even faster and angrier.

The clock's ticking.
Find keys to unlock doors. Heal eachother with medkits. Play smart and work together.

KEY FEATURES

• Play together with a friend or struggle alone
• 3 Difficulty Modes - Normal, Hard & Insane
• Replayability
• Special items, Keys and Medkits will always spawn in different locations
• Scaling Difficulty
• Unpredictable AI
• Immersive 3D Audio
• Enjoy the atmosphere while getting chased

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: PARANOIA PLACE is a 2 player online co-op survival horror game. Together or alone, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty ghost.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2-core CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 780/970/1050 or AMD Radeon 7950/280/470 (3 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4-core CPU @ 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1070/2060 or AMD Radeon Vega64/5700 (8 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

data.legal_notice: © Copyright 2021 BLOODY PIXEL. All Rights Reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of violence, some hinted at suggestive themes, and frequent scary imagery.
